resources.string: Access the settings for your device and set a security method for your screen lock. The security method is necessary to activate the BANCOMAT Pay app.
Are you sure you wish to exit the service activation?
We have updated the app to make it safer. If you wish to continue using BANCOMAT Pay, enable the new authentication method by entering your old PIN
We have updated the app to make it safer. If you wish to continue using BANCOMAT Pay, unlock the device.
Activate BANCOMAT Pay to make payments, send and receive money, all with one touch
To activate BANCOMAT Pay you must access your Bank\'s Home Banking or Mobile Banking.
In just 30 seconds you\’ll be able to pay individuals, make online payments and payments in store
Do you already have an activation code or QR Code for your Bank?
Click on the button here below to enter the alphanumeric code or scan the QR Code
Discover with which bank you can activate the app
Activate the BANCOMAT Pay app to make payments, send and receive money.
Access your Bank\'s Home Banking or Mobile Banking
Follow the instructions to activate the BANCOMAT Pay service by accepting the terms and conditions
Generate the activation code or the QR Code
Do you already have an activation code or QR Code?
Access your Home Banking and follow the instructions to activate the BANCOMAT Pay app: view the QR Code, click below and scan it
Choose which bank you want to activate the app with
Discover the banks offering the service with their app.
You can also activate the service through the listed banks, by accessing or downloading their app
Select the IBAN you want to set as the reference account. Remember, you can always change your selection in the Account Management section accessible from Profile on the menu
Access your Home Banking and follow the instructions to activate the BANCOMAT Pay app
Or enter the activation code from your Home Banking or Mobile Banking
Choose your PIN: do not use number sequences or 5 equal numbers
Enter the verification code received by SMS at number %s
Scan the QR Code found on your Home Banking
Now you can make payments, send and receive money, all with one touch
Enable fingerprint to access and pay without using the BANCOMAT Pay PIN
Too many attempts, try again later
Enter the activation code generated on your Home/Mobile Banking or scan the QR Code by clicking on the icon
BANCOMAT Pay activation was not successful
Check with your bank if you can enable the BANCOMAT Pay service, go back to the app and activate it
Your number is not registered with %s.
You can activate BANCOMAT Pay by selecting one of the banks listed below
Your number is not active with the selected bank.
You can activate BANCOMAT Pay by selecting one of the banks listed below
Captured QR code is incorrect or no longer valid
The activation code or QR Code is no longer valid
By deactivating this function, some data relative to your profile will be accessible and visible to everyone
Please contact us if you require any help using the BANCOMAT Pay app
The new PIN entered must be different from the old one
You have entered an incorrect PIN too many times; reactivate the BANCOMAT Pay app
Incorrect PIN. You have %s attempts remaining
Are you sure you want to exit the BANCOMAT Pay app activation process?
The app has not been correctly initialized
PIN not set because it does not meet requirements

To confirm this transaction use the BANCOMAT Pay® PIN.\nHaving configured a new digital fingerprint on your device, you now need to update the BANCOMAT Pay® app from the Signing in settings – digital fingerprint menu
The mobile number entered is incorrect. Retry
The code is no longer valid. Request a new one.
You have requested a new verification code too many times. Try again later
For security reasons the app on this device will be reset. To continue using this device you must reactivate the app
Now you can access the app and pay using fingerprint. You can always change your choice in the Settings section of the app accessible from the menu
There are no pending payment requests
The collection verification code is incorrect
It is not possible to use the BANCOMAT Pay® app on rooted devices
An error was found. It is not possible to proceed with the collection
We\’re sorry, it\'s not possible to send money to the selected contact
We\’re sorry. It is not possible to continue with this method for the selected beneficiary. Ask the retail outlet how to make the payment using BANCOMAT Pay®
We\’re sorry. It is not possible to continue with the transaction
The description you entered contains some characters which are not allowed. Retry
We’re sorry but it is not possible to reject the money request at the moment
A network error was found. Check the connection
The QR Code is incorrect or is no longer valid
The QR Code belongs to a store which is no longer active on BANCOMAT Pay
The money request has been refused.\nWe\’re sorry but it is not possible to block the contact
The version of the app you\’re using is no longer supported. To continue using the BANCOMAT Pay® app, please download the latest available version from the store
We invite you to review our
and express your preferences regarding the consents indicated below."
I authorise the processing of my personal data to receive communications and advertising messages.

I consent to the processing of my personal data for direct marketing purposes, to receive offers and promotions from BANCOMAT S.p.A. and other commercial partners of BANCOMAT S.p.A. without transfer of the data to these entities, and to conduct User satisfaction surveys and/or market research via text message, WhatsApp and any other channels permitted from time to time
I authorise profiling for commercial and marketing purposes.

I consent to the processing of my personal data, also in combination with the additional data referred to in sub-paragraph 2) of the Privacy Notice and specifically including geolocation data for the collection and analysis of my personal data, in order to process the data and send me, using automated contact methods, personalised promotion messages relating to products, services and offers from BANCOMAT S.p.A. and other commercial partners of BANCOMAT S.p.A. without transferring the data to these entities, and to make use of personalised services based on my consumer habits and appetite
I authorise the transfer of my personal data to third parties for their commercial and marketing purposes.

I consent to the processing of my personal data for its communication to Service Partners, for their marketing purposes and for sending me their offers and promotions, personalised or otherwise, in relation to their products and services
(TRANSFER TO THIRD PARTIES FOR THEIR MARKETING, INCLUDING PROFILED)
You can change your consents in the Profile section
We have received your consent withdrawal request. BANCOMAT Pay will process the request in the next 24 hours
Are you sure you wish to cancel? Any changes will not be confirmed
An error has occurred. Your preferences have not been recorded. Edit them in the Profile section, or they will be presented to you when you first open the app
An error has occurred. Your preferences have not been recorded.
Access the BANCOMAT Pay app to make payments, send and receive money, all in one touch.
For the banks listed, you can activate the service directly by accessing or downloading their App

This feature is purely for the user\'s information. The commercial names and brands contained herein are the property of their respective owners and there is no commercial relationship with BANCOMAT S.p.A.
Enter the name of the shop you are trying to find in the search field above

Unfortunately you have not given permission to share your location. To view the map, get directions and estimate times, please enable permissions in your phone settings.\nAlternatively, you can search for a shop using the search field above.
